ygData.subject: Re: Bardic guild on Tunare
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I really blame things like this more on Verant than twinkers. The crested spaulders are the common drop from the mob that drops the crested helm.  The helm
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 20 Oct 1999, Thormael LGT wrote:
>
> I was giving crested spaulders at level 7 or so. :) I was fighting and some
> higher bard stopped by, waited for me to finish and gave me the armor and
> ran away.

I really blame things like this more on Verant than twinkers.
The crested spaulders are the common drop from the mob that
drops the crested helm. The helm is highly sought after, thus
producing many extraneous crested spaulders, which are either
sold, traded, twinked, given away, or worse (if you've ever
wondered why the banker was wielding thulian claws, this is
why - the claws are the common drop for the rubi breastplate).

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
